verses.verse: Now <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> was <S%H1129>building<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> and he <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon;<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> was 100 <S%H520>cubits<s%> and its <S%H7341>width<s%> <S%H50><s%> <S%H2572><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H30><s%> <S%H7970><s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> on <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H3772>beams<s%> on the <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

And it was <S%H5603>paneled<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on <S%H45>the<s%> <S%H705><s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> <S%H2568>15<s%> <S%H6240><s%> in each <S%H2905>row.<s%>

And [there were artistic <S%H4237>window<s%>] <S%H8261>frames<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2905>rows,<s%> and <S%H4237>window<s%> was <S%H413>opposite<s%> window in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>ranks.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6607>doorways<s%> and <S%H4201>doorposts<s%> [had] <S%H7251>squared<s%> [artistic] <S%H8260>frames,<s%> and <S%H4237>window<s%> was <S%H4136>opposite<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H4237>window<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>ranks.<s%>

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H197>hall<s%> of <S%H5982>pillars;<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2572>50<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and its <S%H7341>width<s%> <S%H30><s%> <S%H7970><s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and a <S%H197>porch<s%> [was] in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them and <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and a <S%H5646>threshold<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them.

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H197>hall<s%> of the <S%H3678>throne<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was to <S%H8199>judge,<s%> the <S%H197>hall<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and it was <S%H5603>paneled<s%> with <S%H730>cedar<s%> from <S%H7172>floor<s%> to <S%H7172>floor.<s%>

And his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he was to <S%H3427>live,<s%> the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H4480>inward<s%> <S%H1004><s%> from the <S%H197>hall,<s%> was of the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H4639>workmanship.<s%> He also <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> like <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H197>hall<s%> for Pharaoh's <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H3947>married.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were of <S%H3368>costly<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> of <S%H1496>stone<s%> <S%H1496>cut<s%> according to <S%H4060>measure,<s%> <S%H1641>sawed<s%> with <S%H4050>saws,<s%> <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and <S%H4480>outside<s%><S%H2351>;<s%> even from the <S%H4527>foundation<s%> to the <S%H2947>coping,<s%> and so on the <S%H2351>outside<s%> to the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

And the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> was of <S%H3368>costly<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> [even] <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>
And <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> were <S%H3368>costly<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H1496>stone<s%> <S%H1496>cut<s%> according to <S%H4060>measure,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar.<s%>

So the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> [had] <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H1496>cut<s%> <S%H1496>stone<s%> and a <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H3772>beams<s%> even as the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Now <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre.<s%>

He was a widow's <S%H1121>son<s%> from the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali,<s%> and his father was a <S%H1>man<s%> of <S%H376>Tyre,<s%> a <S%H6876>worker<s%> in <S%H9177>bronze;<s%> and he was <S%H5178>filled<s%> with <S%H4390>wisdom<s%> and <S%H2451>understanding<s%> and <S%H8394>skill<s%> for <S%H1847>doing<s%> <S%H6213>any<s%> <S%H3605>work<s%> in <S%H4399>bronze.<s%> So he <S%H5178>came<s%> to <S%H935>King<s%> <S%H4428>Solomon<s%> and <S%H8010>performed<s%> <S%H6213>all<s%> his <S%H3605>work.<s%>

And he <S%H9476>fashioned<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze;<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H6967>height<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and a <S%H2339>line<s%> of <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H5437>measured<s%> the <S%H5437>circumference<s%> of <S%H8147>both.<s%>

He also <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3805>capitals<s%> of <S%H3332>molten<s%> <S%H5178>bronze<s%> to <S%H5414>set<s%> on the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars;<s%> the <S%H6967>height<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3805>capital<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3805>capital<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

[There were] <S%H7639>nets<s%> of <S%H7639>network<s%> and <S%H1434>twisted<s%> <S%H1434>threads<s%> of <S%H4639>chainwork<s%> <S%H8333><s%> for the <S%H3805>capitals<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars;<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3805>capital<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3805>capital.<s%>

So he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> on the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7639>network<s%> to <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3805>capitals<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3805>capital.<s%>

And the <S%H3805>capitals<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [were] on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> in the <S%H197>porch<s%> were of <S%H7799>lily<s%> <S%H4639>design,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And [there were] <S%H3805>capitals<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H4480>above<s%> <S%H4605><s%> [and] <S%H4480>close<s%> <S%H5980><s%> to the <S%H990>rounded<s%> <S%H990>projection<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5676>beside<s%> the <S%H7639>network;<s%> and the <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%> [numbered] two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> in <S%H2905>rows<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H8145>both<s%> <S%H3805>capitals.<s%>

Thus he <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> at the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1964>nave;<s%> and he <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> and he <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> it <S%H1162>Boaz.<s%>
And on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> was <S%H7799>lily<s%> <S%H4639>design.<s%> So the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> was <S%H8552>finished.<s%>

Now he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3332>cast<s%> [metal] <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> from <S%H8193>brim<s%> to <S%H8193>brim,<s%> <S%H5696>circular<s%> in <S%H5439>form,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> in <S%H6961>circumference<s%><S%H5437>.<s%> <S%H5439><s%>

And <S%H8478>under<s%> its <S%H8193>brim<s%> <S%H6497>gourds<s%> went <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H5437>encircling<s%> it <S%H6235>ten<s%> to a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> <S%H5439>completely<s%> <S%H5362>surrounding<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%> the <S%H6497>gourds<s%> were in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2905>rows,<s%> <S%H3332>cast<s%> with the <S%H3333>rest.<s%>

It <S%H5975>stood<s%> on <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>facing<s%> <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>facing<s%> <S%H3220>west,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>facing<s%> <S%H5045>south,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6437>facing<s%> <S%H4217>east;<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> [was set] on <S%H4605>top<s%> of them, and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H268>rear<s%> <S%H268>parts<s%> [turned] <S%H1004>inward.<s%>

And it was a <S%H2947>handbreadth<s%> <S%H5672>thick,<s%> and its <S%H8193>brim<s%> was <S%H4639>made<s%> like the <S%H8193>brim<s%> of a <S%H3563>cup,<s%> [as] a <S%H7799>lily<s%> <S%H6525>blossom;<s%> it could <S%H3557>hold<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1324>baths.<s%>

Then he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4350>stands<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze;<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H4350>stand<s%> was <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and its <S%H7341>width<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>
And <S%H2088>this<s%> was the <S%H4639>design<s%> of the <S%H4350>stands:<s%> they had <S%H4526>borders,<s%> even <S%H4526>borders<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7948>frames,<s%>

and on the <S%H4526>borders<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H7948>frames<s%> [were] <S%H738>lions,<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%> and <S%H3742>cherubim;<s%> and on the <S%H7948>frames<s%> there [was] a <S%H3653>pedestal<s%> <S%H4480>above,<s%> <S%H4605><s%> and <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H738>lions<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%> [were] <S%H3914>wreaths<s%> of <S%H4174>hanging<s%> <S%H4639>work.<s%>

Now <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H4350>stand<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> with <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H9375>axles,<s%> and its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6471>feet<s%> had <S%H3802>supports;<s%> <S%H4480>beneath<s%> <S%H8478><s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> [were] <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H3802>supports<s%> with <S%H3914>wreaths<s%> at <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5676>side.<s%>

And its <S%H6310>opening<s%> <S%H4480>inside<s%> <S%H1004><s%> the <S%H3805>crown<s%> at the <S%H4605>top<s%> [was] a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and its <S%H6310>opening<s%> [was] <S%H5696>round<s%> like the <S%H4639>design<s%> of a <S%H3653>pedestal,<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half;<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> on its <S%H6310>opening<s%> [there were] <S%H4734>engravings,<s%> and their <S%H4526>borders<s%> were <S%H7251>square,<s%> not <S%H5696>round.<s%>

And the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> [were] <S%H8478>underneath<s%> the <S%H4526>borders,<s%> and the <S%H3027>axles<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> [were] on the <S%H4350>stand.<s%> And the <S%H6967>height<s%> of a <S%H212>wheel<s%> [was] a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half.<s%>

And the <S%H4639>workmanship<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> [was] like the <S%H4639>workmanship<s%> of a <S%H4818>chariot<s%> <S%H212>wheel.<s%> Their <S%H3027>axles,<s%> their <S%H1354>rims,<s%> their <S%H2839>spokes,<s%> and their <S%H2840>hubs<s%> [were] <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3332>cast.<s%>

Now [there were] <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3802>supports<s%> at the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners<s%> of <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H4350>stand;<s%> its <S%H3802>supports<s%> [were] part of the <S%H4350>stand<s%> itself.

And on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H4350>stand<s%> [there was] a <S%H5696>circular<s%> <S%H5439>form<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> <S%H6967>high,<s%> and on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H4350>stand<s%> its <S%H3027>stays<s%> and its <S%H4526>borders<s%> [were] <S%H4480>part<s%> of it.

And he <S%H9466>engraved<s%> on the <S%H3871>plates<s%> of its <S%H3027>stays<s%> and on its <S%H4526>borders,<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> <S%H8561>trees,<s%> according to the <S%H4626>clear<s%> <S%H4626>space<s%> on <S%H376>each,<s%> with <S%H3914>wreaths<s%> [all] <S%H5439>around.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4350>stands<s%> like <S%H2088>this:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4165>casting,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7095>form.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3595>basins<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3595>basin<s%> <S%H3557>held<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H1324>baths;<s%> <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3595>basin<s%> [was] <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> [and] on <S%H259>each<s%> of the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H4350>stands<s%> [was] <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3595>basin.<s%>

Then he <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4350>stands,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> on the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> on the <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and he <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> [of cast metal] on the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H9506>eastward<s%> <S%H4480>toward<s%> <S%H4136><s%> the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

Now <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3595>basins<s%> and the <S%H3257>shovels<s%> and the <S%H4219>bowls.<s%> So <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>performed<s%> for <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> [in] the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the Lord: <S%H3068><s%>
